nodes.text: A starcutter, or cutter, was a type of civilian starship used during the reign of the Galactic Empire. In 3 BBY, Kier Domadi piloted a starcutter to the Paucris system in an attempt to gather information about a group of insurgents so that he could report them to the Empire.
Following the Siege of Inyusu Tor, Everi Chalis traded an Imperial shuttle for a starcutter.
